title: No capsule from level 41-42
body:
So I've been waiting to receive my capsule from lvling to 42 from 41 but I still haven't received it. Now I am lvl 43 and I received one, so I guess the other one was just a bug that occurred when I finished a mission at the same time as I leveled up! Can you do anything about this? 

Thanks,
KIff.

replies.body: Gotcha covered! Check your loot again when you get the chance for that capsule ^_^

This happened to me too. From level 36 to level 37, I didn't get a loot capsule.

Please help.
I think the bug has been silently fixed yet they don't want to actively search for whoever missed the capsule. The same happened to me. I just submitted a ticket hoping it can be resolved.
